column3: Preparation_Instructions
Marinate salmon in a mixture of soy sauce
column5: and honey for 30 minutes. Grill salmon until cooked through. Serve with steamed vegetables.

column3: In a pot
column4: bring 4 cups of water to a boil. Add 1 tablespoon of miso paste and stir until dissolved. Add 1 cup of diced tofu and simmer for 10 minutes. Serve with scallions.

column3: Heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add 1 cup of diced mushrooms and sauté for 5 minutes. Add 1 cup of arborio rice and stir to coat. Add 2 cups of vegetable broth and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 15 minutes. Stir in 1/4 cup of parmesan cheese and serve.

Heat 2 tablespoons of sesame oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add 1 cup of kimchi and sauté for 5 minutes. Add 2 cups of cooked white rice and stir to combine. Add 2 tablespoons of soy sauce and 1 teaspoon of sugar. Cook for an additional 5 minutes and serve.

Heat 2 tablespoons of vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add 1 cup of diced eggplant and sauté for 5 minutes. Add 1 cup of diced tofu and stir to combine. Add 1/4 cup of soy sauce and 1 teaspoon of sugar. Cook for an additional 5 minutes and serve.
Marinate unagi in a mixture of soy sauce
column5: and honey for 30 minutes. Grill unagi until cooked through. Place unagi on top of a bowl of steamed white rice. Drizzle with additional soy sauce and serve.

column3: In a bowl
column6: and 1/2 cup of cold water. Heat 2 cups of vegetable oil in a large pot over medium heat. Dip vegetables in the tempura batter and fry until golden brown. Serve with soy sauce and grated ginger.

column3: In a large pot
column4: bring 8 cups of water to a boil. Add 1 teaspoon of dashi powder and stir to dissolve. Add 1 package of udon noodles and simmer for 8 minutes. Add 1 cup of diced vegetables and simmer for an additional 5 minutes. Serve with scallions and shichimi togarashi.

column3: Heat 2 tablespoons of sesame oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add 1 cup of diced eggplant and sauté for 5 minutes. Add 1/4 cup of miso paste and 1 teaspoon of sugar. Simmer for an additional 5 minutes and serve.
Heat a grill over medium-high heat. Place 1/2 pound of shishito peppers on the grill and cook for 5 minutes
column4: turning occasionally. Place peppers in a bowl and drizzle with a mixture of soy sauce
column6: and honey. Serve with grated ginger.

column3: Marinate cod in a mixture of miso paste
column5: and honey for 30 minutes. Grill cod until cooked through. Serve with steamed vegetables.

column3: In a bowl
column7: and 1/2 cup of cold water. Heat 1/2 cup of vegetable oil in a large pan over medium heat. Drop 1 tablespoon of batter into the pan and add 1 tablespoon of diced octopus. Fry until golden brown. Serve with takoyaki sauce and mayonnaise.

column3: Bring a pot of water to a boil. Add 1 cup of edamame and cook for 5 minutes. Drain and season with a mixture of soy sauce

Heat 2 tablespoons of sesame oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add 1 cup of diced eggplant and sauté for 5 minutes. Add 1/4 cup of miso paste and 1 teaspoon of sugar. Simmer for an additional 5 minutes and serve.
Heat a grill over medium-high heat. Place 1/2 pound of shishito peppers on the grill and cook for 5 minutes
column4: turning occasionally. Place peppers in a bowl and drizzle with a mixture of soy sauce
column6: and honey. Serve with grated ginger.

column3: Marinate chicken in a mixture of soy sauce
column5: and honey for 30 minutes. Grill chicken until cooked through. Serve with steamed vegetables.

column3: In a pot
column4: bring 4 cups of water to a boil. Add 1 tablespoon of miso paste and stir until dissolved. Add 1 package of ramen noodles and cook for 5 minutes. Add 1 cup of diced vegetables and simmer for an additional 5 minutes. Serve with scallions and shichimi togarashi.

column3: Marinate salmon in a mixture of miso paste
column5: and honey for 30 minutes. Grill salmon until cooked through. Serve with steamed vegetables.

column3: In a bowl
column4: combine 1 cup of cooked white rice
column6: and 1 teaspoon of sesame oil. Form into 3 triangular shaped onigiri. Wrap in nori and serve.

column3: In a pot
column4: bring 4 cups of water to a boil. Add 1 tablespoon of miso paste and stir until dissolved. Add 1 cup of diced tofu and simmer for 10 minutes. Serve with scallions.
